content.raw:
Looking into how to set the seed for gazebo, we need to add something like

```
<arg name="use_random_seed" default="false"/>
<arg name="random_seed" default="1"/>
<arg unless="${arg use_random_seed}" name="command_arg_4" value=""/>
<arg     if="${arg use_random_seed}" name="command_arg_4" value="--seed ${random_seed}"/>name="command_arg_4" value="${random_seed}"
```

to `empty_world.launch`, as it does not already have a setup for setting the seed. However, this is a file in `/opt/ros/melodic/share/gazebo_ros/launch`, which I feel we should not change. 

1. Should we make our own copy of empty\_world.launch with this seed change or leave things as is?
2. Do we want to be able to set the seed by command line or just by editing the `wamv_gazebo/urdf/dynamics/wamv_gazebo_wind_plugin.xacro`'s `random_seed` parameter?
